Name: Who is Paul Herman?
Blurb: Conservative Republican commercial real estate broker who can often be seen around town wearing a "Burbank Guns & Ammo" hat. Currently serves on the Burbank Water & Power Board and consistently votes in favor of fiscally conservative policy. He touts his donations to local nonprofits as a solution to the systemic inequalities of the city. This is common ideological dogma from Libertarian candidates as is signified by his official campaign colors, black on yellow.

Name: Landlords that avoid calling themselves as such
